title: Purple Hour
welcomeText:
# All About Purple Hour©

P﻿hotographers love to talk about Golden Hour, the hour surrounding sunset when the light is golden and perfect for outdoor shots. But that next hour is similarly magical, Purple Hour©, when the sun has set but there is still enough light to see the mix of blues, indigo, and purple that fill the sky. This is my favorite time to be outside, so I coined the phrase Purple Hour© to give it some love.
seoDescription: Purple Hour — The Magical Hour After Golden Hour
